definition: in hundred and one ways/in every possible way/by every means
to put up innumerable obstacles/to create all kinds of difficulties (idiom)
to fawn upon sb in every possible way
to flatter someone in a hundred different ways/assiduous fawning (idiom)

sentences.english: What makes me uncomfortable is that this after he has endured so much, the country has at last harmed him.
sentences.chinese: 我難受的，是這個國家終於傷害到了百般隱忍的他。

sentences.english: My thought struggled at confessing, somehow hesitation ended in flinching.
sentences.chinese: 然妾心懺悔，百般掙扎，躊躇彷徨，畏葸不前。

sentences.english: For years, Henan officials attempted to cover up the epidemic.
sentences.chinese: 多年來，河南官員百般掩蓋這個疫病。

sentences.english: Jung know envy envy zhi jun, can only every comfort.
sentences.chinese: 日俊知道羨花妒忌芷君，只能百般安慰。

sentences.english: All-cotton underwear brings you every comfort.
sentences.chinese: 全棉內衣，給您百般體貼。

sentences.english: They showed the old lady numerous little attentions at the tea party.
sentences.chinese: 在茶話會上他們對那位老太太百般殷勤。

sentences.english: Ep688 - Yingming fawns on Mingming's father as he plans to woo Mingming.
sentences.chinese: 英明百般討好明明的父親，希望他幫忙追求明明。

sentences.english: I tried,but failed,to drum into him that he shouldn't smoke so much.
sentences.chinese: 我百般勸他別抽那麼多煙，但沒有見效。

sentences.english: I really don't know why he is always finding fault with the way I do things.
sentences.chinese: 我不明白爲什麼他對我的工作方法老是百般抉剔。

sentences.english: When Alan was caught cheating, he tried to bluster it out but he couldn't deceive us.
sentences.chinese: 艾倫作弊被抓住後百般狡賴，不過他無法騙過我們。

sentences.english: In every possible way seduce the nan peng, finally, tile bait.
sentences.chinese: 在賽楠蓬的百般勾引下，思瓦終於“上鉤”了。

sentences.english: Asked the mother for her daughter in order to avenge the bullying Xiaolian in every possible way.
sentences.chinese: 詢母爲了替女兒報仇，百般欺辱小憐。

sentences.english: The children instead of giving him pennies laughed at him.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們非但沒給他錢，還對他百般嘲笑。

sentences.english: This mother appears to be helpless, feeling that she is not responsible for the naughtiness of her son.
sentences.chinese: 這個母親顯得百般無奈，覺得兒子的劣行跟自己無關。

sentences.english: He is always finding fault with me.
She never missed an opportunity to humiliate me.
sentences.chinese: 總之一有機會，她都會百般地羞辱我。

definition: to put up innumerable obstacles/to create all kinds of difficulties (idiom)
lit. twice then three times (idiom); fig. repeatedly/over and over again
to the utmost/in every possible way
the utmost care (idiom); to look after sb in every possible way
over and over again/again and again
to suffer enough from/to suffer all kinds of/to have one's fill of
one's whole heart/from the bottom of one's heart
